com.db.chart.listener

Interface OnEntryClickListener


  • public interface OnEntryClickListener
    Interface to define a listener when an chart entry has been clicked

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClick(int setIndex, int entryIndex, android.graphics.Rect rect)
      Abstract method to define the code when an entry has been clicked

    • Method Detail

      • onClick

        void onClick(int setIndex,
           int entryIndex,
           android.graphics.Rect rect)
        Abstract method to define the code when an entry has been clicked
        Parameters:
        setIndex - - index of the entry set clicked
        entryIndex - - index of the entry within set(setIndex)
        rect - - a Rect covering the entry area.
